blocksEnabled.question2: Will you ensure that, if successful, your due diligence and management processes for subcontractors comply with the GLA funding rules?

blocksEnabled.infoMessage: Note that your responses to the questions below may result in your exclusion from the competition. Refer to the Questionnaire Guidance for further information.

question.text: What actions have you taken to improve the quality of your provision? Please note that the GLA reserves the right to reject your application if the issues highlighted in your Ofsted report have not been addressed.

Can you confirm that your organisation will have appropriate management information systems in place to enable the collection and submission of accurate programme data in the required formats, e.g. Individualised Learner Record (ILR) data?

Provide a clear and strong rationale for your choice of sector, inc. skills gaps, job creation; workforce profile, diversity; challenges, opportunities. GLA reserves the right to reject your application if the chosen sector is not considered a priority.
Has your organisation been assigned a Grade 4 Inadequate rating at your most recent Ofsted inspection?
What sector(s) does your application cover?
Do you have a track record of delivering education and training services?
Has your organisation been assigned a Grade 3 Requires Improvement rating at your most recent Ofsted inspection?

blocksEnabled.infoMessage: Where you respond ‘Yes’ to the questions below the GLA may at their discretion, exclude you from the competition if sufficient assurance has not been provided that the issue has been addressed.

question.text: You may upload any supporting documentation

questions.parentAnswerToMatch: Participation in a criminal organisation;Corruption;Fraud;Terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities;Money laundering or terrorist financing;Child labour and other forms of trafficking in human beings

question.text: Has your organisation shown significant or persistent deficiencies in the performance of a substantive requirement under a prior public agreement which led to early termination of that prior agreement within the past three years?

question.text: Demonstrate how your delivery of education/training services will address the local skills needs for each of the sectors you intend to deliver.

question.text: Have you read the Freedom of Information (FoIA) statement in the Prospectus and GLA policies and accept how we generally plan to treat your application and other related information if someone asks to see it under the FoIA 2000?

Do you understand that the GLA will evaluate applications in accordance with the process set out in the Prospectus and Questionnaire Guidance, and that the GLA will not consider appeals regarding the final award decisions made?
